articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: Israel-Hamas war: ICJ charges 'morally repugnant' — Israel – DW – 05/25/2024 - DW (English)
articles.description: Genocide charges brought by South Africa were "morally repugnant," Israel said in a statement issued after the International Court of Justice ordered Israel to "immediately halt" its military offensive. DW has more.
articles.content:
Israel's leadership on Friday said that genocide charges brought by South Africa before the International Court of Justice (ICJ) in the Hague were "false, outrageous and morally repugnant."
The comm… [+1937 chars]
